TAInfo.name: 07Bathtub.xml
TAInfo.rawData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nta PUBLIC '-//Uppaal Team//DTD Flat System 1.1//EN' 'http://www.it.uu.se/research/group/darts/uppaal/flat-1_2.dtd'>
<nta>
	<declaration>clock time;
int rule0;

int bathtub[1];
int bathtub_full[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_bathtub[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_bathtub[1];

urgent broadcast chan send_msg;
int received_msgs=0;
</declaration>
	<template>
		<name x="5" y="5">Bathtub</name>
		<parameter>int i,int fullTime</parameter>
		<declaration>clock t;</declaration>
		<location id="id0" x="279" y="-118">
			<name x="269" y="-152">off</name>
		</location>
		<location id="id1" x="279" y="-17">
			<name x="269" y="-51">run</name>
			<label kind="invariant" x="305" y="-25">t<=fullTime</label>
		</location>
		<location id="id2" x="297" y="136">
			<name x="314" y="153">full</name>
		</location>
		<init ref="id0"/>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id2"/>
			<label kind="guard" x="119" y="25">t>=fullTime</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="76" y="51">bathtub_full[i]=1</label>
			<nail x="195" y="59"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id2"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="238" y="25">turn_on_bathtub[i]?</label>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id2"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="390" y="34">turn_off_bathtub[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="398" y="51">bathtub[i]=0</label>
			<nail x="425" y="0"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="322" y="-110">turn_off_bathtub[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="356" y="-93">bathtub[i]=0</label>
			<nail x="339" y="-68"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="101" y="-110">turn_on_bathtub[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="109" y="-85">bathtub[i]=1</label>
			<nail x="211" y="-68"/>
		</transition>
	</template>
	<system>// Place template instantiations here.
bathtub_0 = Bathtub(0,14);
operateBathtub=OperateBathtub(0,25);

// List one or more processes to be composed into a system.
system bathtub_0,operateBathtub,SMS,Rule0;</system>
	<queries>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=35] {bathtub_full[0],received_msgs}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=35] {bathtub[0],rule0}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>

capability.capability: Remote Control for Opening and Closing

TAInfo.name: 08curtain.xml
TAInfo.rawData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nta PUBLIC '-//Uppaal Team//DTD Flat System 1.1//EN' 'http://www.it.uu.se/research/group/darts/uppaal/flat-1_2.dtd'>
<nta>
	<declaration>clock time;
int rule0=0;
int rule1=0;
int rule2=0;
clock brightness=1500.0886369682387; double dbrightness=0.0;
int openTime=10;
int closeTime=50;
urgent broadcast chan brightness_high[1];
urgent broadcast chan brightness_low[1];

int curtain[1];
urgent broadcast chan open_curtain[1];
urgent broadcast chan close_curtain[1];</declaration>
	<template>
		<name>Curtain</name>
		<location id="id0" x="-136" y="-110">
			<name x="-144" y="-161">close</name>
		</location>
		<location id="id1" x="-136" y="25">
			<name x="-144" y="51">open</name>
		</location>
		<init ref="id1"/>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-102" y="-59">close_curtain[0]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-93" y="-34">curtain[0]=0,
dbrightness=-0.05</label>
			<nail x="-102" y="-42"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-331" y="-68">open_curtain[0]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-297" y="-51">curtain[0]=1,
dbrightness=0</label>
			<nail x="-170" y="-42"/>
		</transition>
	</template>
	<system>// Place template instantiations here.
curtain_0=Curtain();
// List one or more processes to be composed into a system.
system Brightness,BrightnessCensor,Rule0,Rule1,Rule2,curtain_0;
    </system>
	<queries>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {brightness}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {rule1}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>

capability.capability: Automated Cleaning of Floors and Carpets

TAInfo.name: 09CleaningRobot_3.xml
TAInfo.rawData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nta PUBLIC '-//Uppaal Team//DTD Flat System 1.1//EN' 'http://www.it.uu.se/research/group/darts/uppaal/flat-1_2.dtd'>
<nta>
	<declaration>// Place global declarations here.
clock time;
int rule0=0;
int rule1=0;


int openTime=3;
int offTime=9;
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_cleaningRobot[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_cleaningRobot[1];
int cleaningRobot[1];
clock position;
</declaration>
	<template>
		<name x="5" y="5">CleaningRobot</name>
		<declaration>// Place local declarations here.</declaration>
		<location id="id0" x="178" y="-8">
			<name x="168" y="-42">off</name>
			<label kind="invariant" x="195" y="-25">position'==0</label>
		</location>
		<location id="id1" x="161" y="212">
			<name x="170" y="229">on</name>
			<label kind="invariant" x="144" y="263">position'==1</label>
		</location>
		<init ref="id0"/>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="204" y="102">turn_off_cleaningRobot[0]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="195" y="136">cleaningRobot[0]:=0</label>
			<nail x="221" y="93"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-51" y="59">turn_on_cleaningRobot[0]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-17" y="85">cleaningRobot[0]:=1</label>
			<nail x="119" y="85"/>
		</transition>
	</template>
	<system>// Place template instantiations here.
cleaningRobot_0 = CleaningRobot();
// List one or more processes to be composed into a system.
system cleaningRobot_0,Rule0,Rule1;
    </system>
	<queries>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=20] {dposition}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=20] {rule0,time,openTime}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=20] {cleaningRobot[0]}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=9] {rule1}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=5] {rule0}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=20] {position,cleaningRobot[0],rule0}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>

TAInfo.name: 10air.xml
TAInfo.rawData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nta PUBLIC '-//Uppaal Team//DTD Flat System 1.1//EN' 'http://www.it.uu.se/research/group/darts/uppaal/flat-1_2.dtd'>
<nta>
	<declaration>// Place global declarations here.
clock time;
clock pm2_5=30.0;
double dpm2_5=0.0;
urgent broadcast chan pm_high[1];
urgent broadcast chan pm_low[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_purifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_purifier[1];
int purifier[1];
int rule0;
int rule1;</declaration>
	<template>
		<name>AirPurifier</name>
		<parameter>int i</parameter>
		<location id="id0" x="-136" y="-110">
			<name x="-146" y="-144">off</name>
		</location>
		<location id="id1" x="-144" y="178">
			<name x="-154" y="144">on</name>
		</location>
		<init ref="id0"/>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-126" y="84">turn_off_purifier[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-126" y="101">purifier[0]=0,
dpm2_5=dpm2_5+0.1</label>
			<nail x="-51" y="25"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-203" y="-63">turn_on_purifier[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-203" y="-46">purifier[0]=1,
dpm2_5=dpm2_5-0.1</label>
			<nail x="-221" y="17"/>
		</transition>
	</template>
	<system>// Place template instantiations here.
airpurifier_0=AirPurifier(0);
// List one or more processes to be composed into a system.
system PM2_5,PM_Censor,airpurifier_0,Rule0,Rule1;
    </system>
	<queries>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {rule0,rule1, purifier[0]}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {high}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {pm2_5}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>

capability.capability: Dual-Flush System (for liquid and solid waste)

TAInfo.name: 11toilet.xml
TAInfo.rawData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nta PUBLIC '-//Uppaal Team//DTD Flat System 1.1//EN' 'http://www.it.uu.se/research/group/darts/uppaal/flat-1_2.dtd'>
<nta>
	<declaration>// Place global declarations here.
clock time;
int position;
int rule0=0;
int rule1=0;

int toilet[1];
urgent broadcast chan open_toilet[1];
urgent broadcast chan close_toilet[1];</declaration>
	<template>
		<name>Toilet</name>
		<parameter>int i</parameter>
		<location id="id0" x="-68" y="-178">
			<name x="-78" y="-212">close</name>
		</location>
		<location id="id1" x="-59" y="8">
			<name x="-69" y="-26">open</name>
		</location>
		<init ref="id0"/>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-25" y="-153">close_toilet[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-50" y="-135">toilet[0]=0</label>
			<nail x="0" y="-93"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-204" y="-153">open_toilet[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-187" y="-110">toilet[0]=1</label>
			<nail x="-119" y="-93"/>
		</transition>
	</template>
	<system>// Place template instantiations here.
toilet_0=Toilet(0);
// List one or more processes to be composed into a system.
system Human,toilet_0,Rule0,Rule1;
    </system>
	<queries>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=30] {position,toilet[0]}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=30] {position,toilet[0],rule0,rule1}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>

TAInfo.name: 12sink_3.xml
TAInfo.rawData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nta PUBLIC '-//Uppaal Team//DTD Flat System 1.1//EN' 'http://www.it.uu.se/research/group/darts/uppaal/flat-1_2.dtd'>
<nta>
	<declaration>// Place global declarations here.
clock time;
int position;
int rule0=0;
int rule1=0;
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_tap[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_tap[1];
int tap[1];</declaration>
	<template>
		<name>Tap</name>
		<parameter>int i</parameter>
		<location id="id0" x="-59" y="-144">
			<name x="-69" y="-178">off</name>
		</location>
		<location id="id1" x="-51" y="51">
			<name x="-61" y="17">on</name>
		</location>
		<init ref="id0"/>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-33" y="-17">turn_off_tap[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-33" y="0">tap[i]=0</label>
			<nail x="17" y="-51"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-118" y="-114">turn_on_tap[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-118" y="-97">tap[i]=1</label>
			<nail x="-136" y="-51"/>
		</transition>
	</template>
	<system>// Place template instantiations here.
tap_0=Tap(0);
Human_0=Human(3,7,12);
// List one or more processes to be composed into a system.
system Rule0,Rule1,tap_0,Human_0;</system>
	<queries>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=20] {tap[0]}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=20] {rule1}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=20] {rule0}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>

			<label kind="assignment" x="-17" y="-136">refrigerator[0]:=0</label>

	</queries>
</nta>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

	<declaration>// Place global declarations here.

double dtemperature=0.0;

urgent broadcast chan temperature_low[1];

urgent broadcast chan turn_off_fan[1];
int fan[1];
</declaration>

		</location>

			<label kind="assignment" x="324" y="102">fan[0]=0,dtemperature=dtemperature+0.05</label>
			<nail x="382" y="51"/>

Fan_0 = Fan(0);

		</query>

			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>

capability.capability: Automatic Shut-Off When Water Runs Out

TAInfo.name: 05humidifier.xml
TAInfo.rawData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nta PUBLIC '-//Uppaal Team//DTD Flat System 1.1//EN' 'http://www.it.uu.se/research/group/darts/uppaal/flat-1_2.dtd'>
<nta>
	<declaration>// Place global declarations here.
clock time;
int rule0=0;
int rule1=0;
int rule2=0;
int rule3=0;
int rule4=0;
int rule5=0;

urgent broadcast chan humidity_low[1];
urgent broadcast chan humidity_low_enough[1];
urgent broadcast chan humidity_high[1];
urgent broadcast chan humidity_high_enough[1];

int humidifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_humidifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_humidifier[1];

int dehumidifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_dehumidifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_dehumidifier[1];

int window[1];
urgent broadcast chan close_window[1];
urgent broadcast chan open_window[1];

clock humidity=15.0;double dhumidity=0.0;</declaration>
	<template>
		<name>Humidifier</name>
		<parameter>int i</parameter>
		<location id="id0" x="-195" y="25">
			<name x="-204" y="-17">off</name>
		</location>
		<location id="id1" x="-195" y="-153">
			<name x="-205" y="-187">on</name>
		</location>
		<init ref="id0"/>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-391" y="-102">turn_on_humidifier[0]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-408" y="-68">humidifier[0]:=1,
dhumidity=dhumidity+0.5</label>
			<nail x="-246" y="-68"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-169" y="-127">turn_off_humidifier[0]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-127" y="-85">humidifier[0]:=0,
dhumidity=dhumidity-0.5</label>
			<nail x="-153" y="-68"/>
		</transition>
	</template>
	<system>// Place template instantiations here.
// EnvironmentTemperature,
// List one or more processes to be composed into a system.
Humidifier_0=Humidifier(0);
Dehumidifier_0=Dehumidifier(0);
Window_0=Window(0);
system Humidity,Humid_censor,Humidifier_0,Dehumidifier_0,Window_0,Rule0,Rule1,Rule2,Rule3,Rule4,Rule5;
    </system>
	<queries>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=10] {window[0]}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=10] {humidifier[0],window[0],rule4}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {humidity,rule0,rule1,rule2,rule3,humidifier[0],dehumidifier[0]}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>

capability.capability: Efficiently Removes Excess Moisture from the Air
Large Water Tank Capacity with Auto Shut-Off
Built-in Air Filter for Improved Air Quality

TAInfo.name: 21dehumidifier.xml
TAInfo.rawData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nta PUBLIC '-//Uppaal Team//DTD Flat System 1.1//EN' 'http://www.it.uu.se/research/group/darts/uppaal/flat-1_2.dtd'>
<nta>
	<declaration>// Place global declarations here.
clock time;
int rule0=0;
int rule1=0;
int rule2=0;
int rule3=0;
int rule4=0;
int rule5=0;

urgent broadcast chan humidity_low[1];
urgent broadcast chan humidity_low_enough[1];
urgent broadcast chan humidity_high[1];
urgent broadcast chan humidity_high_enough[1];

int humidifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_humidifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_humidifier[1];

int dehumidifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_dehumidifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_dehumidifier[1];

int window[1];
urgent broadcast chan close_window[1];
urgent broadcast chan open_window[1];

clock humidity=15.0;double dhumidity=0.0;</declaration>
	<template>
		<name>Dehumidifier</name>
		<parameter>int i</parameter>
		<location id="id0" x="-34" y="76">
			<name x="-43" y="34">off</name>
		</location>
		<location id="id1" x="-34" y="-102">
			<name x="-44" y="-136">on</name>
		</location>
		<init ref="id0"/>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-230" y="-51">turn_on_dehumidifier[0]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-247" y="-17">dehumidifier[0]:=1,
dhumidity=dhumidity-0.5</label>
			<nail x="-85" y="-17"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-8" y="-76">turn_off_dehumidifier[0]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="34" y="-34">dehumidifier[0]:=0,
dhumidity=dhumidity+0.5</label>
			<nail x="8" y="-17"/>
		</transition>
	</template>
	<system>// Place template instantiations here.
// EnvironmentTemperature,
// List one or more processes to be composed into a system.
Humidifier_0=Humidifier(0);
Dehumidifier_0=Dehumidifier(0);
Window_0=Window(0);
system Humidity2,Humid_sensor,Window_0,Rule0,Rule1,Rule2,Rule3,Rule4,Rule5;
    </system>
	<queries>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=10] {window[0]}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=10] {humidifier[0],window[0],rule4}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {humidity,rule0,rule1,rule2,rule3,humidifier[0],dehumidifier[0]}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>

		</location>

			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="25" y="-119">turn_off_soundBox[0]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="25" y="-102">soundBox[i]=0</label>
			<nail x="17" y="-93"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-255" y="-110">turn_on_soundBox[0]?</label>

			<nail x="-102" y="-93"/>
		</transition>

	<system>// Place template instantiations here.
human_0 = Human(3,8,15,24);
window_0=Window(0);
sound_box_0=SoundBox(0);
light_0=Light(0);
gas_0=Gas(0);
alert_0=Alert(0);

// List one or more processes to be composed into a system.
system CO,COCensor,human_0,window_0,alert_0,sound_box_0,light_0,gas_0,Rule0,Rule1,Rule2,Rule3,Rule4,Rule5,Rule6;</system>
	<queries>

			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>

			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {rule5,window[0]}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {alert[0]}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {co,rule5}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
		<query>

			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>

TAInfo.name: 23Door.xml
TAInfo.rawData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nta PUBLIC '-//Uppaal Team//DTD Flat System 1.1//EN' 'http://www.it.uu.se/research/group/darts/uppaal/flat-1_2.dtd'>
<nta>
	<declaration>// Place global declarations here.
clock time;int position=0;int rule1=0;
int rule2=0;
int rule3=0;
int rule4=0;
int rule5=0;
int rule6=0;
int rule7=0;
int fan[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_fan[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_fan[1];
int airpurifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_airpurifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_airpurifier[1];
int airconditioner[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_airconditioner_off[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_airconditioner_cool[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_airconditioner_heat[1];
int door[1];
urgent broadcast chan open_door[1];
urgent broadcast chan close_door[1];
int light[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_light[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_light[1];
int curtain[1];
urgent broadcast chan open_curtain[1];
urgent broadcast chan close_curtain[1];
int camera[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_camera[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_camera[1];
int humidifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_on_humidifier[1];
urgent broadcast chan turn_off_humidifier[1];
int window[1];
urgent broadcast chan open_window[1];
urgent broadcast chan close_window[1];
int received_msgs=0;
urgent broadcast chan send_msg;
clock temperature=18.0;double dtemperature=0.0;</declaration>
	<template>
		<name>Door</name>
		<parameter>int i</parameter>
		<declaration>//controlled_device</declaration>
		<location id="id0" x="0" y="25">
			<name x="17" y="16">dooropen</name>
		</location>
		<location id="id1" x="0" y="119">
			<name x="-68" y="110">doorclosed</name>
		</location>
		<init ref="id1"/>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-9" y="42">open_door[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="17" y="59">door[i]=1</label>
			<nail x="51" y="76"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-85" y="76">close_door[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-85" y="59">door[i]=0</label>
			<nail x="-51" y="68"/>
		</transition>
	</template>
	<system>HumanInstance=Human(100.0,200.0);
AirConditioner_0 = AirConditioner(0);
Door_0 = Door(0);
Window_0 = Window(0);
system HumanInstance, AirConditioner_0, Door_0, Window_0, SMS, EnvironmentTemperature, Rule1, Rule2, Rule3, Rule4, Rule5, Rule6, Rule7;
</system>
	<queries>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {temperature, rule1, rule2, rule3, rule4, rule5, rule6, rule7, airconditioner[0], door[0], window[0], received_msgs, position}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>

int window[1];
urgent broadcast chan open_window[1];
urgent broadcast chan close_window[1];
int received_msgs=0;
urgent broadcast chan send_msg;
clock temperature=18.0;double dtemperature=0.0;</declaration>
	<template>
		<name>AirConditioner</name>
		<parameter>int i</parameter>
		<location id="id0" x="-17" y="25">
			<name x="-17" y="-25">acoff</name>
		</location>
		<location id="id1" x="-212" y="136">
			<name x="-221" y="144">cool</name>
		</location>
		<location id="id2" x="195" y="136">
			<name x="178" y="144">heat</name>
		</location>
		<init ref="id0"/>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id2"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="85" y="-17">turn_airconditioner_heat[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="0" y="25">airconditioner[i]=2,dtemperature=dtemperature+0.05</label>
			<nail x="195" y="25"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id2"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-59" y="170">turn_airconditioner_cool[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-102" y="187">airconditioner[i]=1,dtemperature=dtemperature-0.1</label>
			<nail x="-17" y="204"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-187" y="8">turn_airconditioner_off[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-221" y="25">airconditioner[i]=0,dtemperature=dtemperature+0.05</label>
			<nail x="-212" y="25"/>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id2"/>
			<target ref="id0"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="42" y="68">turn_airconditioner_off[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="0" y="85">airconditioner[i]=0,dtemperature=dtemperature-0.05</label>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id1"/>
			<target ref="id2"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-68" y="119">turn_airconditioner_heat[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-102" y="136">airconditioner[i]=2,dtemperature=dtemperature+0.1</label>
		</transition>
		<transition>
			<source ref="id0"/>
			<target ref="id1"/>
			<label kind="synchronisation" x="-170" y="68">turn_airconditioner_cool[i]?</label>
			<label kind="assignment" x="-212" y="85">airconditioner[i]=1,dtemperature=dtemperature-0.05</label>
		</transition>
	</template>
	<system>HumanInstance=Human(100.0,200.0);
AirConditioner_0 = AirConditioner(0);
Door_0 = Door(0);
Window_0 = Window(0);
system HumanInstance, AirConditioner_0, Door_0, Window_0, SMS, EnvironmentTemperature, Rule1, Rule2, Rule3, Rule4, Rule5, Rule6, Rule7;
</system>
	<queries>
		<query>
			<formula>simulate[<=300] {temperature, rule1, rule2, rule3, rule4, rule5, rule6, rule7, airconditioner[0], door[0], window[0], received_msgs, position}</formula>
			<comment></comment>
		</query>
	</queries>
</nta>
